meanings: (수를 헤아림) reckoning, [명사] calculation, figures; (간단한) sum, [동사] calculate, reckon, (formal) compute
(이해를 따짐, 상황을 판단함) [명사] calculation, consideration, [동사] calculate, consider

examples.korean: to send/issue/settle an invoice for the goods 발음듣기 물품 대금 청구서[송장]를 보내다/발송하다/처리하다[청구서대로 계산해 주다] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to send/issue/settle an invoice for the goods 발음

examples.korean: Let me settle with you for the meal. 발음듣기 (당신이 대신 낸) 제 몫의 식사비를 계산해 드릴게요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let me settle with you for the meal. 발음

examples.korean: Have you figured out how much the trip will cost? 발음듣기 그 여행 경비가 얼마나 들지 계산해 봤어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Have you figured out how much the trip will cost? 발음

examples.korean: [+ wh-] Have you figured out how much the trip will cost? 발음듣기 그 여행 경비가 얼마나 들지 계산해 봤어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: [+ wh-] Have you figured out how much the trip will cost? 발음

examples.korean: Please settle your bill before leaving the hotel. 발음듣기 호텔을 떠나시기 전에 숙박비를 다 지불[계산]해 주세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please settle your bill before leaving the hotel. 발음
